measure_description: Measured two units with identical settings over 300s and calculated average for single unit. Multiple combinations of settings were tested. Eco mode only has an effect when WLAN-AP (range extender) is disabled.
name: Shelly 1 Mini Gen4
config_flow_sub_profile_remarks:
You need to select a profile depending on your settings.
The ECO setting only changes the power consumption in the listed configurations. Activating any other settings not listed in the profile name will change the power draw.
"WLAN + BT + ECO": All three turned on, repeater turned off.
"WLAN + ECO": Both turned on, repeater turned off.
author: SBD
